review: We got our first stick as a combo when purchasing Sling TV. I plugged it into our HDMI port and into the wall for power and got nothing. No welcome screen, nothing. Our TV found it fine, but still blank screen. I searched online about older Samsung TVs (which we have) and thought that might be the issue. Eventually, after trying everything I could, I called customer support.After getting through to the third layer of support, I talked to a woman who agreed to send me out a new one to make sure mine wasn't defective. I got it, plugged it in and it was fine. Never had any issues since. Turns out the first one I received must have had something wrong with it. So, in case this is the same for you and you've done all your troubleshooting, contact them and get a replacement.
